title: I'm so tired and sick of these smurfs
body:
These guys get on their bronze accounts and que up into bronze ranked games and brag and brag about how good they are, so you give them what they want, and as soon as things start heading south, boom. Harassment and toxicity for days. "stay bronze kiddo you belong here" "you're literally so fucking useless and bad at this game" Like really dude? No shit i belong here, if i didn't belong here i wouldn't be here. I'm just trying to get better, and douchebags like this make me question my motive to even try to climb. I don't care how good your main is, and i don't want to hear your constant bitching about how you aren't winning this bronze game, and have you take out all your rage on me because I'm a 4/9/26 Naut and apparently the game is my fault. Fucking sick of these guys. Amazed at how bad bronze is? Good for you, go back to whatever elo your main is and spare me your constant bitching, you fucking chose to play here after all.

EDIT: Thanks for all the replies everyone! My most popular post ever by far. I was a little stressed out because of this and i decided to clear things up. 
The Ezreal in the game that caused me to make this rant WAS good. Most likely was a smurf, but he was just so full of himself it was ridiculous. harassed every other team member, flamed us for every single TINY mistake (like ulting zed instead of the adc or something like that) and never looked at or took the blame for his own mistakes. like getting caught out in the river, it was OUR fault for not following him like little starving puppies, obviously. I've had these liars that say the are smurfs and i can assure you this guy was legit. But the toxicity and harassment is what i wanted to address. The fact that he thought he was privileged enough to talk down on us like he was a king among peasants was ridiculous.

Trust me, if you're a Bronze X mid lane main, you'll know if the person claiming to be a "Plat 4 mid" is playing at Bronze X level or a higher level. You might not know the difference between a Gold, Plat, or Diamond level, but you know that it should be far better than anywhere near where you are.

Besides, if the enemy team is all smurfs, all the more reason for you to be on a roll you know the best and *not* give it to someone else.

I've never actually been in bronze myself. I think maybe Bronze 1 long time ago but that was a long time ago.

Anyways, when the Ranked Reset hit, I didn't play ranked at all until three - four days ago. Now, as you can imagine this is atleast 4 or so months after the reset, damn near everyone had done their reset matches by now. 

During my ten matches for the reset placement, I was paired up with nothing but unranked and bronze players for some reason, probably because of MMR. I'm talking FRESH level 30's and some bronze 2's / Silver 4's. Now, it was a bit unfair because I was Silver 1 last season (Honestly gold but I never finished my promo's) But I noticed that there were ALOT of smurfs in these unranked games. Almost everyone in the game was unranked and doing placements. Some were legit new players, but quite a few in my games were smurfs. Most had fresh level 30 with their match history being nothing but bot matches where they had no items, no kills, and alot of deaths. (Xp grinding in bots, with bots.) 

These smurfs were probably upwards of plat. And most playing Nunu jungle. And I hated seeing it; not because it made the game harder for me, but because these unranked players were having to do their placement matches, **the games that are suppose to determine skill and where they will be placed!** with smurfs who literally rolled all over them. I tracked two players on Lolking who played very well. They both ended up in Bronze because of these smurfs ruining the placement matches. I got into Silver IV simply because of my high MMR before the reset, but these players were thrown into bronze. How is this fair to new ranked players? They're being thrown into a division they probably don't belong in simply because a Plat player got bored and felt like trolling them. Riot seriously needs to address the issue.

TD : DR 
Smurfs are in placement matches ruining the game for new players.

News flash:  They aren't really smurfs.

If someone claims to be a plat or higher smurf in bronze and loses their lane, they are most definitely lying. If they're playing mid lane and they can't snowball the game, they are MOST DEFINITELY lying. I got through Bronze and Silver this season as support (I've been Gold I a few times, and Plat in Season 1, all as support) and winning games against bronze players is generally as easy as denying vision and warding. This is true for every lane, not just support, but being in support puts you in a position to do this.

So basically, if someone says "I am plat smurf", goes mid, and never buys a single ward, they're probably a Silver V smurf playing in Bronze for funsies.
Save your sanity. They are just trolls of another color. And trolls don't get punished.
